JumpScale.core.shellconfig package¶

Submodules¶

JumpScale.core.shellconfig.ConfigFileManager module¶

class JumpScale.core.shellconfig.ConfigFileManager.ConfigFileManager(configType)[source]¶
checkParam(section, paramName)[source]¶
chooseSectionInteractive(sectionDescription='section', sort=False)[source]¶

multiple choice of section in configtype return name

getParam(section, paramName, description='', defaultValue='', forceDefaultValue=False, forceAsk=False, password=False)[source]¶

is default configuration management which is personal per user of jumpscale e.g. personal svn connections this method allows you to get a parameter, if not found it will interactive ask for that parameter and store it in the apropriate .cfg file in the jumpscale cfg dir

getParamAndFix(section, paramname, fixmethod)[source]¶
getParams(section)[source]¶

Returns all parameter names in the section.

@param section: section of which the parameter names should be returned @type section: string @return: list of string names of parameters

getSections()[source]¶

return array of found sections in config file

getSetParam(section, paramName, description='', value='', default='')[source]¶

if parameter filled in it will set it, if not filled in

it will read it from config file, if “” in configfile it will ask for a value

if you want none in config file mark NONE

removeSection(sectionName)[source]¶
setParam(section, paramName, value)[source]¶
showSection(section, descr='')[source]¶

show all settings from a specific section

validateSectionInteractive(section, descr='', confirm=True)[source]¶

show all settings from a specific section and ask for confirmation if correct, if not ask to change
